7 void mst_path::generate_path (geometry_msgs::Point start)
8 {
9  // reset counter of current waypoint
10  this->wp = 0;
11 
12  // starting vertex
13  geometry_msgs::Point wp;
14  wp.x = (start.x - origin.x) * cos(rotation) - (start.y - origin.y) * sin(rotation);
15  wp.y = (start.x - origin.x) * sin(rotation) + (start.y - origin.y) * cos(rotation);
16  path.push_back(wp);
17  int current = 2 * round(wp.y / map.info.resolution) * 2*map.info.width + 2 * round(wp.x / map.info.resolution);
18 
19  // visited vertices
20  unordered_set<int> removed;
21 
22  // previous vertex
23  int previous;
24 
25  // last movement
26  int offset;
27 
28  // possible movements
29  vector<int> movement;
30  movement.push_back(2*map.info.width);
31  movement.push_back(-1);
32  movement.push_back(-2*map.info.width);
33  movement.push_back(1);
34 
35  // valid movement
36  bool found = false;
37 
38  // look for valid first step
39  for (int idx=0; idx<movement.size(); idx++) {
40  if (nodes[current].count(current + movement[idx]) > 0) {
41  previous = current + movement[idx];
42  found = true;
43  break;
44  }
45  }
46 
47  // no valid first step found
48  if (!found) {
49  ROS_ERROR("No path found!");
50  return;
51  }
52 
53  // generate path
54  do {
55  // remember visited vertices
56  removed.insert(current);
57 
58  // last movement
59  offset = distance(movement.begin(), find(movement.begin(), movement.end(), previous-current));
60 
61  // look for valid step
62  found = false;
63  previous = current;
64  for (int idx=0; idx<movement.size(); idx++){
65  if (nodes[previous].count(previous + movement[(idx+offset) % movement.size()]) > 0 &&
66  removed.count(previous + movement[(idx+offset) % movement.size()]) <= 0) {
67  current = previous + movement[(idx+offset) % movement.size()];
68  found = true;
69  break;
70  }
71  }
72  if (!found) {
73  return;
74  }
75 
76  // remove vertices from sets
77  nodes[current].erase(previous);
78  nodes[previous].erase(current);
79 
80  // convert index to relative waypoint position on map
81  wp.x = (current % (2*map.info.width)) / 2.0 * map.info.resolution;
82  wp.y = (current / (2*map.info.width)) / 2.0 * map.info.resolution;
83 
84  // shift waypoint to center path on map
85  double width_path = (round(width / map.info.resolution) * 2 - 1) / 2.0 * map.info.resolution;
86  double height_path = (round(height / map.info.resolution) * 2 - 1) / 2.0 * map.info.resolution;
87  wp.x += (width - width_path) / 2.0;
88  wp.y += (height - height_path) / 2.0;
89 
90  // add vertex to path
91  path.push_back(wp);
92  } while (found);
93 
94  // final waypoint
95  wp = path.front();
96  path.push_back(wp);
97 }
98 
99 nav_msgs::Path mst_path::get_path ()
100 {
101  nav_msgs::Path nav_path;
102  vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> poses;
103  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
104  for (auto p : path) {
105  // rotate
106  pose.pose.position.x = p.x * cos(-rotation) - p.y * sin(-rotation);
107  pose.pose.position.y = p.x * sin(-rotation) + p.y * cos(-rotation);
108 
109  // relative to original map
110  pose.pose.position.x += origin.x;
111  pose.pose.position.y += origin.y;
112 
113  poses.push_back(pose);
114  }
115  nav_path.poses = poses;
116  nav_path.header.stamp = Time::now();
117  nav_path.header.frame_id = "local_origin_ned";
118  return nav_path;
119 }
120 
121 geometry_msgs::Point mst_path::get_waypoint (geometry_msgs::Point position, double tolerance)
122 {
123  // close enough to or past current waypoint
124  if (dist(position, get_wp()) < tolerance || dist(position, get_wp(1)) < dist(position, get_wp())) {
125  // select next waypoint
126  ++wp;
127  ROS_DEBUG("Select waypoint %d", wp);
128  }
129 
130  return get_wp();
131 }
132 
133 void mst_path::initialize_graph (nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid gridmap, bool vertical, bool connect4)
134 {
135  ROS_DEBUG("Gridmap size %dx%d origin (%.2f,%.2f)", gridmap.info.width, gridmap.info.height, gridmap.info.origin.position.x, gridmap.info.origin.position.y);
136  // orientation of path edges
137  this->vertical = vertical;
138 
139  // initialize path
140  map = gridmap;
141  int rows = gridmap.info.height;
142  int cols = gridmap.info.width;
143  nodes.clear();
144  nodes.resize(2*rows*2*cols);
145  edges.clear();
146  path.clear();
147 
148  // double graph resolution
149  valarray<bool> inflated(2*rows*2*cols);
150  for (int i=0; i<2*rows; i++) {
151  for (int j=0; j<2*cols; j++) {
152  inflated[i*2*cols + j] = (gridmap.data[(i/2)*cols + j/2] == 0);
153  }
154  }
155 
156  // iterate all rows and columns
157  for (int i=0; i<2*rows; i++) {
158  for (int j=0; j<2*cols; j++) {
159  // found a vertex
160  if (inflated[2*i*cols+j]) {
161  // check von neumann neighborhood for connected vertices
162  if (i>0 && inflated[(i-1)*2*cols+j]) {
163  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i-1)*2*cols+j, 1);
164  }
165  if (i<2*rows-1 && inflated[(i+1)*2*cols+j]) {
166  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i+1)*2*cols+j, 1);
167  }
168  if (j>0 && inflated[i*2*cols+j-1]) {
169  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, i*2*cols+j-1, 1);
170  }
171  if (j<2*cols-1 && inflated[i*2*cols+j+1]) {
172  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, i*2*cols+j+1, 1);
173  }
174 
175  // check moore neighborhood for connected vertices
176  if (!connect4) {
177  if (i>0 && j>0 && inflated[(i-1)*2*cols+j-1]) {
178  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i-1)*2*cols+j-1, 1);
179  }
180  if (i<2*rows-1 && j<2*cols-1 && inflated[(i+1)*2*cols+j+1]) {
181  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i+1)*2*cols+j+1, 1);
182  }
183  if (i<2*rows-1 && j>0 && inflated[(i+1)*2*cols+j-1]) {
184  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i+1)*2*cols+j-1, 1);
185  }
186  if (i>0 && j<2*cols-1 && inflated[(i-1)*2*cols+j+1]) {
187  add_edge(i*2*cols+j, (i-1)*2*cols+j+1, 1);
188  }
189  }
190  }
191  }
192  }
193 }

195 void mst_path::initialize_map (geometry_msgs::Point origin, double rotation, double width, double height)
196 {
197  // bottom left of area
198  this->origin = origin;
199 
200  // rotation of map
201  this->rotation = rotation;
202 
203  // dimensions of area
204  this->width = width;
205  this->height = height;
206 
207  ROS_DEBUG("Area size %.2fx%.2f origin (%.2f,%.2f)", width, height, origin.x, origin.y);
208 }

210 void mst_path::initialize_tree (vector<edge> mst)
211 {
212  // remove edges not required by mst
213  int cols = map.info.width;
214  int alpha, vmax, vmin;
215  for (int i=0; i<mst.size(); i++) {
216  vmax = max(mst[i].from, mst[i].to);
217  vmin = min(mst[i].from, mst[i].to);
218 
219  if (vmax - vmin == 1) {
220  alpha = (4*vmin + 3) - 2 * (vmax % cols);
221  remove_edge(edge(alpha, alpha + 2*cols, 1));
222  remove_edge(edge(alpha + 2*cols, alpha, 1));
223  remove_edge(edge(alpha+1, alpha+1 + 2*cols, 1));
224  remove_edge(edge(alpha+1 + 2*cols, alpha+1, 1));
225 
226  }
227  else{
228  alpha = (4*vmin + 2*cols) - 2 * (vmax % cols);
229  remove_edge(edge(alpha, alpha+1, 1));
230  remove_edge(edge(alpha+1, alpha, 1));
231  remove_edge(edge(alpha + 2*cols, alpha+1 + 2*cols, 1));
232  remove_edge(edge(alpha+1 + 2*cols, alpha + 2*cols, 1));
233  }
234  }
235 }
236 
237 void mst_path::reduce ()
238 {
239  // iterate over path segments
240  for (auto it = path.begin()+1; it != path.end()-1; ) {
241  // direction of path segments
242  double dx1 = it->x - (it-1)->x;
243  double dy1 = it->y - (it-1)->y;
244  double dx2 = (it+1)->x - it->x;
245  double dy2 = (it+1)->y - it->y;
246 
247  // two consecutive path segments are parallel, remove intermediate point
248  if (atan2(dy1,dx1) == atan2(dy2,dx2))
249  it = path.erase(it);
250 
251  else
252  ++it;
253  }
254 }
255 
256 bool mst_path::valid ()
257 {
258  return 0 <= wp && wp < path.size();
259 }
260 
261 void mst_path::add_edge (int from, int to, int cost)
262 {
263  // add edge to priority queue
264  edge e(from,to,cost,vertical);
265  edges.insert(e);
266 
267  // add vertices to sets
268  nodes[from].insert(to);
269  nodes[to].insert(from);
270 }
271 
272 double mst_path::dist (geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
273 {
274  return hypot(p1.x - p2.x, p1.y - p2.y);
275 }
276 
277 geometry_msgs::Point mst_path::get_wp (int offset)
278 {
279  geometry_msgs::Point waypoint;
280 
281  if (0 <= wp+offset && wp+offset < path.size()) {
282  // rotate
283  waypoint.x = path[wp+offset].x * cos(-rotation) - path[wp+offset].y * sin(-rotation);
284  waypoint.y = path[wp+offset].x * sin(-rotation) + path[wp+offset].y * cos(-rotation);
285 
286  // relative to original map
287  waypoint.x += origin.x;
288  waypoint.y += origin.y;
289  }
290 
291  return waypoint;
292 }
293 
294 void mst_path::remove_edge (edge e)
295 {
296  if (edges.count(e) > 0) {
297  edges.erase(e);
298  nodes[e.from].erase(e.to);
299  nodes[e.to].erase(e.from);
300  }
301 }
